price: 46. Mpe basilaki kosala likita lia mabe, kasi likita lia bango wana liyebani(2) epai ya Allah, ata soki likita lia bango lizali makasi ekoki kopanza ngomba te.
arabic: وَقَدۡ مَكَرُواْ مَكۡرَهُمۡ وَعِندَ ٱللَّهِ مَكۡرُهُمۡ وَإِن كَانَ مَكۡرُهُمۡ لِتَزُولَ مِنۡهُ ٱلۡجِبَالُ
footnotes: 2 likita lia mabe eyebani epai ya Allah: Elingi koloba: Ezali pamba ераї ya Allah.

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: waqad makarū makrahum waʿinda al-lahi makruhum wa-in kāna makruhum litazūla min'hu al-jibālu
